steps.content: No, they could be fake or result in your account being banned. While countless websites and YouTube videos claim to have a one-stop solution to hacking Clash of Clans, the reality of the situation is that the game cannot be hacked. Don't be misled by comments on videos or sites promoting hacking. These comments are typically created by fake accounts in order to encourage others to try the hack. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Any service claiming to help hack Clash of Clans is, at best, misleading; in many cases, these services are also scams that can steal your information or download viruses onto your computer or Android.
steps.content: Any service claiming to help hack Clash of Clans is, at best, misleading; in many cases, these services are also scams that can steal your information or download viruses onto your computer or Android. Attempting to hack Clash of Clans by using a service is all but guaranteed to cause problems, whether it be because of malware or your account being reported for violating the Terms of Service. Best-case scenario, attempting to hack Clash of Clans just wastes your time.

steps.title: Avoid spending your startup gems.
steps.content: Avoid spending your startup gems. Clash of Clans starts you off with a large sum of gems; while you'll have to spend around half of them in order to finish the tutorial, you'll be left with the remaining gems. It can be tempting to blow these gems on as many items as possible, but remembering to be frugal is a great way to start off your game on the correct foot. [2] X Research source Gems also shouldn't be used to purchase resources or decrease building times. Again, patience is your friend when attempting to build up your gem inventory.

steps.title: Earn Clash of Clans achievements
steps.content: Earn Clash of Clans achievements . Achievements are perhaps the most lucrative way in which you can earn gems, as unlocking all three tiers of every achievement awards you around $100 worth of gems. You can view a list of the Clash of Clans achievements and their requirements here . Simply connecting Clash of Clans to the Google Play Store will net you 50 gems. Once you've unlocked an achievement, tapping your current level in the top-left corner of the screen and then tapping Claim Rewards next to the achievement will add the reward gems to your inventory.

steps.title: Remove obstacles when possible.
steps.content: Remove obstacles when possible. You can remove an obstacle such as a tree or a rock by tapping it and then confirming the choice. This will award you various amounts of gems ranging from 0 to 6. Some obstacles, such as trees, will respawn every 8 hours. Rocks do not respawn, so consider removing them after removing an obstacle for which you received 0 gems. This will almost always ensure that you receive at least 1 gem for removing the rocks.

steps.title: Build and upgrade the Gem Mine.
steps.content: Build and upgrade the Gem Mine. Pouring elixirs into building the Gem Mine may seem like a strange way to spend your hard-earned resources, but the Gem Mine will automatically reward you with at least 2 gems per day whether or not you play. [3] X Research source You'll need to retrieve your gems periodically depending on the Gem Mine's level. For example, a level 1 Gem Mine can hold a maximum of 10 gems before it will stop producing them. Retrieving your gems will allow the Gem Mine to resume production. At its highest tier, the Gem Mine can store up to 18 gems. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Use Google Opinion Rewards.
steps.content: Use Google Opinion Rewards. Google Opinion Rewards is an Android app that allows you to complete small surveys to earn anywhere between $0.10 and $1.00. Completing enough surveys will give you the cash needed to purchase more gems. This isn't a hack, but it's a relatively quick way to earn a small, disposable amount of money with which you can feel comfortable buying gems. Google Opinion Rewards can be downloaded for free from the Google Play Store.
